name: 眼球大師 Eyeball Master
description:
Outline of the story:


"It" is neither human nor demon, just a tiny creature called "eyeball" that can see the world

Named...Mumu and its friend Dan Dan

However, one day Mumu 's good friend Dan Dan inexplicably picked up a book full of monsters, putting Mumu and DanDan's lives in jeopardy!

Game Features:

5 different random levels
40+ types of monsters
40+ active skills to choose from
40+ passive skills to choose from
40+ different special weapons
10+ Artifacts
10+ Items

Through the rise of various values, the combination of skills, the passive selection, the selection of weapons, the selection of artifacts, various genres and gameplays are assembled

Collecting elements:


The selected skills and passive skills of the monsters killed in the level will be added to the illustration

Production elements:


Materials dropped from monsters can be used to craft objects and buildings
